subject: Looking for details...
author: Chad
full_text:
I am looking to make a ghost box. I hear you can get the parts at
Radio Shack. If you know what I'm talking about, please give me some
info. Also, if anyone can make a Frank's box, I'd be more than willing
to buy one. Being not of technological mind, I can't decipher the
plans. I am part of a fledgling group in GA, and we are dying to get
our hands on one of these things.
